name: Acute Mesenteric Ischemia
chief_complaint: Severe abdominal pain that came on suddenly and won't go away
prognosis: Guarded - high mortality if not treated promptly, better outcomes with early intervention
description: A life-threatening vascular emergency where blood supply to the intestines is compromised, often due to embolism, thrombosis, or low-flow states. Requires urgent diagnosis and treatment to prevent bowel necrosis.
